mapper.select: select tll.tl_name,tcs.tc_name,tcs.tc_technology,tee.te_id emp_id,tee.te_name,tcs.tc_personnum from t_level tll inner join t_classes tcs on tll.tl_id=tcs.tl_id inner join t_employee tee on tcs.te_id=tee.te_id order by tll.tl_name
select tc_id id, tc_name text from t_classes
select stu_id stuid,stu_name stuname from t_student where class_id=#{class_id}

select tclass.stu_id,tclass.tc_name,tclass.stu_name,tclass.stu_sex,count(tclass.ttds_stu_id) as shulian from (select tsce.*,ttds.stu_id ttds_stu_id from (select tst.stu_id,tcs.tc_name,tst.stu_name,tst.stu_sex,tee.te_id from t_student tst inner join t_classes tcs on tst.class_id=tcs.tc_id inner join t_employee tee on tcs.te_id=tee.te_id) tsce inner join t_talk_details ttds on tsce.stu_id=ttds.stu_id) tclass group by tclass.stu_id,tclass.tc_name,tclass.stu_name,tclass.stu_sex,tclass.te_id having tclass.tc_name=#{tc_name} and tclass.te_id=#{emp_id} union select tst.stu_id,tcs.tc_name,tst.stu_name,tst.stu_sex,0 as shulian from t_student tst inner join t_classes tcs on tst.class_id=tcs.tc_id inner join t_employee tee on tcs.te_id=tee.te_id where tcs.tc_name=#{tc_name} and tee.te_id=#{emp_id} and tst.stu_id not in (select stu_id from t_talk_details)

select ttds.talk_details_id,ttds.talk_type,tst.stu_name,ttds.talk_content,ttds.viewpoint,ttds.reason,tee.te_name talk_person,ttk.talk_time from t_employee tee inner join t_talk ttk on tee.te_id=ttk.talk_person inner join t_talk_details ttds on ttk.talk_id=ttds.talk_id inner join t_student tst on tst.stu_id=ttds.stu_id
ttds.stu_id=#{stu_id}
and viewpoint=0
and viewpoint=1
and viewpoint=2
mapper.update: update t_talk_details set viewpoint=1 where talk_details_id=#{talk_details_id}
update t_talk_details set viewpoint=2,reason=#{reason} where talk_details_id=#{talk_details_id}
